headline: Adobe (ADBE) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Adobe (ADBE) has been under pressure recently, with the share price showing negative returns over the past month and past 3 months. That weak momentum is prompting closer attention to the underlying business. See our latest analysis for Adobe. Over the past year, Adobe’s share price return has softened, with a year to date share price return decline of 12.88% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 33.46%, which points to fading momentum as investors reassess growth prospects and...

summary: Lucius DiPhillips joined the software provider Tuesday. He replaces Cynthia Stoddard, who now serves as CIO at Intel.

headline: Adobe vs. Intuit: Which 52-Week Low Is a Buy?
summary: In Tuesday’s trading, 195 Nasdaq stocks hit new 52-week lows. Among those stocks were two tech titans, Adobe and Intuit. They’ve been hit in 2026 by investor concerns that AI could hurt SaaS companies’ future growth and profits.

headline: Cautious Analyst Sentiment on Adobe (ADBE) Amid Intensifying Competition Across Core Creative Markets
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is included on our list of the best undervalued wide moat stocks. Amid intensifying competition pressures across its core creative markets, analyst sentiment surrounding Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) remains cautious. On January 14, 2026, Baird reduced its price target on the stock from $410.00 to $350.00, while reiterating a ‘Neutral’ rating. The cautious […]
